comments.en:
CMYK cartridges and printheads

Cartridges (CMYK): c4836a c4837a c4838a c4840a

Print heads (CMYK): c4811a c4812a c4813a c4810a

Large-format printer.

According to user reports compatible to the DesignJet 100, DesignJet 500, DesignJet 800, DesignJet 5000 and DesignJet 5500, because they all use the same Windows driver. But be careful, the DesignJet 120 uses a different Windows driver.
